actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend sections 170, 2055, and 2522 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction for income, estate, and gift tax purposes for contributions to a section 501(c)(10) organization for the purpose of building or maintaining a building.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide income, estate and gift tax deductions for charitable contributions for the construction or maintenance of buildings for tax-exempt lodge organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 170, 2055, and 2522 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction for income, estate, and gift tax purposes for contributions to a section 501(c)(10) organization for the purpose of building or maintaining a building.
